column2: §M(ED:MP)§! Realm Size Under Limit (AI)
This is an §Gabsent human player§! whose realm size is §Gunder§! the Global Realm Size Limit, so they receive §Gno penalties§!.[edmp_realm_size_display_calculation]
§M(ED:MP)§! Realm Size Under Limit (Player)
This is a §Yhuman player§! whose realm size is §Gunder§! the Global Realm Size Limit, so they receive §Gno penalties§!.[edmp_realm_size_display_calculation]
§M(ED:MP)§! Realm Size Over Limit (AI)
This is an §Gabsent human player§! whose realm size is §Rover§! the Global Realm Size Limit, so they receive §Gno penalties§!.[edmp_realm_size_display_calculation]
§M(ED:MP)§! Realm Size Over Limit (Player)
This is an §Yhuman player§! whose realm size is §Rover§! the Global Realm Size Limit, so they receive §Rescalating penalties§!.[edmp_realm_size_display_calculation]
§M(ED:MP)§! Realm Size Extra Limit (Permanent)
This §Gpermanent§! modifier §Greduces§! this character's realm size, for the purpose of the §M(ED:MP)§! Realm Size Limit calculation.
§M(ED:MP)§! Realm Size Extra Limit (Temporary)
This §Rtemporary§! modifier §Greduces§! this character's realm size, for the purpose of the §M(ED:MP)§! Realm Size Limit calculation.
§M(ED:MP)§! Realm Size Recalc Blocked
This character has recently forcibly recalculated their realm size.\n\nTo avoid excess lag, they are prevented from performing another recalulation while this modifier is in effect.

column1: # Custom Loc used in many of the modifiers

column2:
Total Realm Size: §Y[Root.edmp_realm_size_total.GetValue]§!
 - From holdings in realm: §Y[Root.edmp_realm_size_total_holdings.GetValue]§!

 - From player vassals' realms: §Y[Root.edmp_realm_size_total_player_vassals.GetValue]§!
 - From player vassals' "Extra Realm Size Limit": §Y[Root.edmp_realm_size_total_extra_player_vassals.GetValue]§!
 - From your "Extra Realm Size Limit": §Y[Root.edmp_realm_size_total_extra.GetValue]§!

Global Realm Size Limit: §Y[Root.global_edmp_realm_size_limit.GetValue]§!

Excess Realm Size: §Y[Root.edmp_realm_size_excess.GetValue]§!

(ED:MP) Realm Size - Recalc

§M(ED:MP)§! Realm Size is normally recalculated on a random day, once per year.
However, in some circumstances, you may wish to force an early recalculation.

§RWARNING!§! You may only take this decision §Yonce every 3 months§!!
§g(IE: Grant independence to all relevant characters BEFORE taking this decision.)§!

§RWARNING!§! You may only take this decision §Yonce every 3 months§!! (Tracked by the modifier below.)
§g(IE: Grant independence to all relevant characters BEFORE taking this decision.)§!
Has NOT recently used this decision to recalculate realm size (expires §Y[This.edmp_realm_size_recently_forced_recalculation.GetExpiryDate]§!)

You have NOT received any penalties.
